questions.question: What is the primary color dominating the packaging's design?
What specific substance does this product contain, as explicitly stated on the box?
What is the form in which the nicotine is presented, as clearly indicated?
What is the prominent brand name featured on the packaging?
Considering the visual representation, what is the approximate quantity of pieces included?
What is the shape of the individual gum pieces shown on the box?
Based on the image, what is the apparent color of the nicotine gum pieces?
What is the dosage strength of nicotine, in milligrams, as displayed on the box?
What is the intended use of this product, as prominently indicated on the packaging?
What flavor of nicotine gum is indicated on the box?
What additional material is included with the product, according to the box?
What is the texture of the box visually implied (matte or glossy)?
What type of packaging is shown, a box or a pouch?
What is the overall shape of the main product packaging?
Does the box show a comparison to another brand?
